languages.text: "Добродетель в неведении, в милосердии — слабость, и нет большей награды, чем смерть за Него".

traits.locale_text: [Draft] ...залить мясо 2 литрами воды, засыпать перец и лавровый лист повкусу, и варить на сильном огне до закипания, затем...

languages.text: "Remember: ignorance is virtue, mercy is weakness, and there is no greater reward than to die in His name."
languages.original_text: "Добродетель в неведении, в милосердии — слабость, и нет большей награды, чем смерть за Него".

traits.locale_text: "Remember that ignorance is virtue, mercy is weakness, and there is no greater reward than death in His name."
"Remember that ignorance is virtue, mercy is weakness, and there is no greater reward than death in His name."
"Remember: ignorance is virtue, mercy is weakness, and there is no greater reward than to die in His name."
"Remember: ignorance is virtue, mercy is weakness, and there is no greater reward than to die in His name."
"Remember: ignorance is virtue, mercy is weakness, and there is no greater reward than to die in His name."
"Remember: ignorance is virtue, mercy is weakness, and there is no greater reward than to die in His name."
"Remember: ignorance is virtue, mercy is weakness, and there is no greater reward than to die in His name."
"Remember: ignorance is virtue, mercy is weakness, and there is no greater reward than to die in His name."

languages.text: « N'oubliez pas que l'ignorance est une vertu, la miséricorde une faiblesse, et qu'il n'y a pas de plus grande récompense que de mourir en Son nom. »
languages.original_text: "Remember: ignorance is virtue, mercy is weakness, and there is no greater reward than to die in His name."

traits.locale_text: « N'oubliez pas que l'ignorance est une vertu, la miséricorde une faiblesse, et qu'il n'y a pas de plus grande récompense que de mourir en Son nom. »

languages.text: «Recuerden: la ignorancia es una virtud, la misericordia es debilidad y la mayor recompensa es morir en Su nombre».
languages.original_text: "Remember: ignorance is virtue, mercy is weakness, and there is no greater reward than to die in His name."

traits.locale_text: «Recuerden: la ignorancia es una virtud, la misericordia es debilidad y la mayor recompensa es morir en Su nombre».

languages.text: 「覚えておいてください。無知は美徳であり、慈悲は弱さであり、あのお方の名の下に死ぬことは何よりの褒美なのです」
languages.original_text: "Remember: ignorance is virtue, mercy is weakness, and there is no greater reward than to die in His name."

traits.locale_text: 「覚えておいてください。無知は美徳であり、慈悲は弱さであり、あのお方の名の下に死ぬことは何よりの褒美なのです」

languages.text: “牢牢记住，无知是美德，仁慈是软弱。没有任何赏赐，能比为了帝皇的圣名赴死更加光荣。”
languages.original_text: "Remember: ignorance is virtue, mercy is weakness, and there is no greater reward than to die in His name."

traits.locale_text: “牢牢记住，无知是美德，仁慈是软弱。没有任何赏赐，能比为了帝皇的圣名赴死更加光荣。”

languages.text: "Denkt daran: Unwissenheit ist eine Tugend, Gnade eine Schwäche, und die größte Belohnung ist der Tod in Seinem Namen."
languages.original_text: "Remember: ignorance is virtue, mercy is weakness, and there is no greater reward than to die in His name."

traits.locale_text: "Denkt daran: Unwissenheit ist eine Tugend, Gnade eine Schwäche, und die größte Belohnung ist der Tod in Seinem Namen."

languages.text: "Şunu aklından çıkarma: Cehalet mutluluktur, merhamet zayıflıktır ve O'nun adına ölmekten daha büyük bir ödül yoktur."
languages.original_text: "Remember: ignorance is virtue, mercy is weakness, and there is no greater reward than to die in His name."
